wikipedia_page.main: Sir Francis Adams Hyett (1844–1941) was chairman of Gloucestershire County Council from 1918 to 1920.

link_mentions.page: Bibliography of the City of Gloucester
response: Printed bibliographies of Gloucester include Francis Hyett and William Bazeley's The Bibliographer's Manual of Gloucestershire Literature, published in five volumes in 1846 by John Bellows of Gloucester and with later supplements.The Bibliographer's Manual of Gloucestershire Literature / Francis Adams Hyett. British Library. Retrieved 22 July 2019.
